invalidData.summary: The provided crafting system import data is not valid. Correct the following errors and try again: {errors}
invalidData.noData: No data was provided to import.

import.success: Successfully imported crafting system "{systemName}", with {essenceCount} essences, {componentCount} components, and {recipeCount} recipes.

duplicate.failure: Failed to duplicate crafting system with ID "{systemId}". Caused by: {cause}
duplicate.success: Successfully duplicated crafting system with "{systemId}". The clone's ID is "{cloneId}".

export.craftingSystemNotFound: The crafting system with ID {craftingSystemId} does not exist.

compendium.notFound: The compendium with ID {compendiumId} could not be found.
compendium.invalidItemData: The compendium with ID "{compendiumId}" has a problem with its item data. Unable to load items its UUIDs: "{itemIdsWithErrors}".
compendium.invalidType: The compendium with ID "{compendiumId}" is of type {suppliedType}. Fabricate only allows {allowedTypes}.

errors.invalidRead: The stored value for the setting {settingPath} is not valid, and could not be read. {errors}
errors.invalidWrite: The provided value for the setting {settingPath} is not valid, and could not be saved. {errors}

craftingSystem.doesNotExist: The crafting system with ID {craftingSystemId} does not exist.
craftingSystem.invalid: The crafting system with ID {craftingSystemId} is not valid. Errors: {errors}.
craftingSystem.missingCraftingSystems: The crafting systems with the IDs {craftingSystemIds} could not be found.
craftingSystem.cannotModifyEmbedded: The crafting system {craftingSystemName} is an embedded system and cannot be modified.
craftingSystem.cannotDeleteEmbedded: The crafting system {craftingSystemName} is an embedded system and cannot be deleted.

document.notFound: The document with UUID {documentUuid} could not be found.

recipe.doesNotExist: The recipe with ID {recipeId} does not exist.
recipe.invalid: The recipe with ID {recipeId} is not valid. Errors: {errors}.
recipe.missingRecipes: The recipes with the IDs {recipeIds} could not be found.
recipe.noneSaved: A problem occurred saving one or more recipes. No recipes were saved.

component.doesNotExist: The component with ID {componentId} does not exist.
component.invalid: The component with ID {componentId} is not valid. Errors: {errors}.
component.missingComponents: The components with the IDs {componentIds} could not be found.
component.noneSaved: A problem occurred saving one or more components. No components were saved.

essence.doesNotExist: The essence with ID {essenceId} does not exist.
essence.invalid: The essence with ID {essenceId} is not valid. Errors: {errors}.
essence.missingEssences: The essences with the IDs {essenceIds} could not be found.
essence.noneSaved: A problem occurred saving one or more essences. No essences were saved.

migration.notNeeded: Fabricate settings are already up to date and don't not need to be migrated.
migration.started: Fabricate is migrating your crafting system settings. Please do close your browser or shut down the game world.
migration.failed: Fabricate was unable to migrate your crafting system settings. Please report this error to the module author.
migration.success: Fabricate has finished migrating your crafting system settings!

crafting.actorNotFound: The Actor with id {actorId} could not be found.
crafting.disabledCraftingSystem: {name} belongs to the crafting system {craftingSystemName}, which is disabled and cannot be used.

salvage.componentNotFound: The component with id {componentId} could not be found.
salvage.componentNotOwned: The component with name {componentName} is not owned by the Actor {actorName}.
salvage.insufficientQuantity: The Actor {actorName} does not have enough of the component {componentName} to salvage. Required {requiredQuantity}, but only had {actualQuantity}.
salvage.disabledComponent: The component {componentName} is disabled and cannot be salvaged.
salvage.unsalvageableComponent: The component {componentName} has no usable salvage options.
salvage.invalidItemData: The component with ID "{componentId}" has a problem with its item data. Caused by: {cause}
salvage.multipleCraftingSystems: This Salvage Result has components from multiple Crafting Systems. This is not supported, and possibly a bug. The crafting system IDs are: {craftingSystemIds}.
salvage.salvageOptionIdRequired: The component {componentName} has {salvageOptionCount} salvage options, but no salvage option ID was provided. The available salvage option ids are: {salvageOptionIds}.
salvage.missingCatalysts: Unable to salvage the component {componentName}. Missing required catalysts: {missingCatalystNames}.

recipe.recipeNotFound: The recipe with id {recipeId} could not be found.
recipe.invalidItemData: The recipe with ID "{recipeId}" has a problem with its item data. Caused by: {cause}
recipe.disabledRecipe: The recipe {recipeName} is disabled and cannot be crafted.
recipe.requirementOptionIdRequired: The recipe {recipeName} has {requirementOptionCount} requirement options, but no requirement option ID was provided. The available requirement option ids are: {requirementOptionIds}.
recipe.resultOptionIdRequired: The recipe {recipeName} has {resultOptionCount} result options, but no result option ID was provided. The available result option ids are: {resultOptionIds}.
recipe.multipleCraftingSystems: The recipe {recipeName} has components from multiple Crafting Systems. This is not supported, and possibly a bug. The crafting system IDs are: {craftingSystemIds}.
recipe.invalidComponentItemData: The recipe {recipeName} has a problem with its component item data. The invalid component IDs are {invalidComponentIds}.
recipe.multipleEssenceCraftingSystems: The recipe {recipeName} has essences from multiple Crafting Systems. This is not supported, and possibly a bug. The crafting system IDs are: {craftingSystemIds}.
recipe.invalidEssenceItemData: The recipe {recipeName} has a problem with its essence item data. The invalid essence IDs are {essenceIds}.
recipe.insufficientUserComponents: The selected components for crafting {recipeName} are not all owned by the Actor {actorName}. The missing components are {missingComponentNames}.
recipe.insufficientComponents: The Actor {actorName} does not have enough of the required components to craft {recipeName}.

error.invalidActor: The Actor this inventory was configured for is not valid.
error.componentNotFound: The component with ID {componentId} could not be found.

hints.requiresCatalysts: This component requires these catalysts to salvaged.

errors.noElementData: Could not read element data from drop event.
errors.unsupportedFoundryDropEventType: Fabricate does not support the Foundry VTT drop event type "{dropEventType}". Supported types are: {supportedTypes}.
errors.invalidJson: Could not parse JSON data from drop event.
errors.unrecognisedCompendium: The compendium with ID "{compendiumId}" could not be found by Fabricate.
errors.unrecognisedComponent: The component with name "{componentName}" and ID "{componentId}" could not be found by Fabricate.

errors.notSalvageable: Something has gone wrong, and this component has zero salvage options.

hints.doSalvage: Salvaging this component will add these items to your inventory
hints.requiresCatalysts: This component requires these catalysts to salvaged.

doSalvage.title: Salvage component?
doSalvage.content: Salvaging {componentName} will remove it from your inventory, and add the salvage results.

errors.noCraftingAttempt: Unable to perform crafting. No crafting attempt was prepared for the recipe. This is likely to be a bug with Fabricate.
errors.notPossible: You don't meet the requirements to craft {recipeName}

hints.doCrafting: Crafting this recipe will remove any consumed ingredients from your inventory and add the recipe results.

doCraftRecipe.title: Craft Recipe?
doCraftRecipe.content: Crafting {recipeName} will remove any consumed ingredients from your inventory and add the recipe results.

errors.importIdMismatch: Cannot import Crafting System definition for {systemName}. The ID in the uploaded file does not match that of {systemName}. Wanted {expectedId}, but got {actualId}. Perhaps you uploaded the wrong file, or meant to use the Import new button below?

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: Disabled systems cannot be used. Their components cannot be salvaged. Their recipes cannot be crafted.

components.label: Components
components.noneFound: This Crafting System has no components
components.create: Drag and drop an item onto the area above to add your first one!

import.noElementData: Component import error: Could not read element data from drop event.
import.invalidDocumentType: Component import error: "{suppliedType}" cannot be imported as a Crafting component. Fabricate only allows the following document types to be imported as components: {allowedTypes}.
import.invalidJson: Component import error: Could not parse JSON data from drop event.
import.itemAlreadyIncluded: Cannot import item with UUID {itemUuid}. {componentName} already exists in {systemName}.

errors.itemNotFound: The item does not exist or has been deleted.
errors.itemNotSet: No item configured. You can set one in the component editor.
errors.optionNotUnique: The component {componentName} has options that are not uniquely named.

info.noAvailableSalvage: Add other components to {systemName} to be able to add them as Salvage to {componentName}.
info.noAvailableEssences: Add essences to {systemName} to be able to add them to {componentName}.

delete.title: Delete component "{componentName}"?
delete.content: This will remove "{componentName}" from "{systemName}", as well as all references to it in Recipes and other Components. This action cannot be undone.

recipes.label: Recipes
recipes.title: {systemName} Recipes
recipes.noneFound: This Crafting System has no recipes
recipes.create: Drag and drop an item onto the area above to add your first one!

errors.itemNotFound: The item does not exist or has been deleted.
errors.itemNotSet: No item configured. You can set one in the recipe editor.
errors.optionNotUnique: The recipe {recipeName} has options that are not uniquely named.

info.noAvailableEssences: Add essences to {systemName} to be able to add them to {recipeName}.

importItemAsComponent.title: Import new component "{componentName}"?
importItemAsComponent.content: "{componentName}" will be imported into "{systemName}" and added to this Recipe.

delete.title: Delete component "{recipeName}"?
delete.content: This will remove "{recipeName}" from "{systemName}". This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Delete essence "{essenceName}"?
delete.content: This will remove "{essenceName}" from "{systemName}", as well as all references to it in Recipes and Components. This action cannot be undone.

info.noEssences: This Crafting System has no essences.
info.createFirst: Click the button above to add your first one!

deleteSystemConfirm.title: Delete Crafting System
deleteSystemConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete {systemName}? This action cannot be undone.

saveCraftingSystem.success: The Crafting System {systemName} was successfully updated.

exportCraftingSystem.success: The Crafting System {systemName} was successfully exported to {fileName}.

description.update: Re-import this Crafting System definition by uploading a JSON file. This will overwrite the existing Crafting System. This operation cannot be undone.
description.create: Import a new Crafting System from a JSON file. This will create a new Crafting System matching the imported definition.

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Fabricate accepts "fabricate" or "mastercrafted" when importing Crafting Systems.
errors.noFileUploaded: You must select a file to upload
errors.targetSystemNotFound: Could not import Crafting System definition for {systemName}. {systemName} doesn't seem to exist, which is really strange. This should never happen.

items.systemHasError: This crafting system has one or more errors!
